title: Trump's Second Term Tariff Exemptions Made in Secret Without Public Process
summary: In Trump's second term after 2024, favoritism in tariff policy became more blatant. Instead of a public application process for exemptions, deals are now struck in secret with industry executives and lobbyists making their case privately. The administration issued a list of over 1,000 exempted products with minimal explanation. Wall Street Journal warned this opaque system invites even greater cronyism.

sources.title: Trump's Tariffs - Crony Capitalism and the New Economy of Obedience
Opinion on Trump's Second Term Tariff Policy

notes: Pattern of tariff exemptions strongly suggests tariffs wielded as tool of crony capitalism
